thread.section_title: Hotel Relais Bosquet Paris - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nearly perfect
thread.title_full: Nearly perfect - Review of Hotel Relais Bosquet Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: thejeffpe
title: Nearly perfect
text: Can't rave enough about the location and the customer service. We forgot our passports in the safe after we'd checked out...and we able to recover several hours later without a hitch. The location is great as you're not a far walk from the Eiffel Tower and a 1 minute walk to Rue Cler. If you want to hang at a cafe and watch the world go by, this is where to do it. Room was big enough for us Americans and had plenty of charm. Modern and updated, too. Our room had one 'fun' quirk....the toilet was in a separate 'room' from the rest of the bathroom...all part of the adventure!!
